definition: to show in full light/to be revealed in its entirety
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)

sentences.english: His evil intentions were manifest and yet we could not stop him.
sentences.chinese: 譯他的險惡用心表露無遺，但是我們卻沒辦法阻止他。

sentences.english: JANG Hyuk is basking in happiness and it shows.
sentences.chinese: 張赫正沉浸在幸福中，這一點現在已表露無遺。

sentences.english: And then there is the sheer joy, etched so openly on the musicians' faces.
sentences.chinese: 樂師們臉上有種表露無遺的純粹快樂。
